message: I feel sleep paralysis at night
reply: It may indicate a spiritual disturbance. Recite Ayat al-Kursi, maintain wudu, and seek guidance from a qualified ruqyah practitioner if it persists.

message: How to perform ruqyah at home?
reply: You can recite Surah Al-Fatihah, Ayat al-Kursi, and Surah Al-Baqarah. Maintain prayer and dhikr. Consult a qualified practitioner for complex cases.
